channel.title: Help
channel.description:
ive gotten two scripts, an auto cutter, and an auto ess miner, but i cannot download the needed includes, i have downloaded them from the sticky, it wont work.. my error message is
[code]Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL.Scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/Skill/WoodCutting.Scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/Misc/PlayerForm.Scar does not exist. Failed when compiling[/code]
edit: the test scripts work great that come with SCAR

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Cow Mad Cow
item.description:
@Mad_Cow wrote:

[quote=“pur3 d3ath, post:1, topic:9374”]ive gotten two scripts, an auto cutter, and an auto ess miner, but i cannot download the needed includes, i have downloaded them from the sticky, it wont work… my error message is

Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL.Scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/Skill/WoodCutting.Scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/Misc/PlayerForm.Scar does not exist. Failed when compiling

edit: the test scripts work great that come with SCAR[/quote]

Download SRL here - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,3617.0.html

Make sure the folders are like so

SCAR 2.03 -> includes -> SRL -> SRL.scar
SCAR 2.03 -> includes -> SRL -> SRL -> Skill -> Woodcutting.scar
SCAR 2.03 -> includes -> SRL -> SRL -> SRL -> Misc -> PlayerForm.scar

or

/SCAR 2.03/includes/SRL/SRL.scar
/SCAR 2.03/includes/SRL/SRL/Skill/WoodCutting.scar
/SCAR 2.03/includes/SRL/SRL/Misc/PlayerForm.scar

Next time please use the search button.

Hope it helped,
Mad Cow

Read full topic
